verses.content: Vânhai khin Pathien ropuizie chu ân hriettir a, Boruok lientak khin a kutsuok chu ân langtir hlak a.
Sûn hin sûn kuomah thu a hril sâwng pei a, Zânin zân kuomah hrietna ân lang sâwngtir pei hlak.
Thuhril hrim hrim le ṭawng hrim hrim a um nawh a, An râwl chu naa hriet thei a ni nawh.
An inkhina hrui po po chu hnuoi chung po poa keimarin a um a, An thu chu kâwlkawdawng chenin ân thang suok tah a. Chuonghaia chun nisa ta ding khin puon in a kei a,
Chu nisa chu moneitu ding a pindana inthawka suok ang a nih, Mi hrâttak angin a tlânna lampuia tlân ding chu a hlim hlak.
A suokna chu kâwlkawdawng tawpa inthawkin a na, A tlân kuolna chu a tâwp khingtieng chen a nih; A lumna chu hre lo dinga thuphmang hrim hrim a um nawh.
LALPA dân chu a ṭha famkim a, hringna a siemṭha hlak, LALPA thu inhriettir chu ring a um a, mi mâwl a sukvar hlak.
LALPA thununna thu chu ân dik a, lungril a suklâwm hlak, LALPA thupêk chu ân thieng a, mithai a sukvar hlak.
LALPA ṭina chu a fai a, kumkhuo a dai hlak, LALPA rorêlna chu ân dik a, a fel vêl vawng a nih.
Chuong chu rângkachak nêka ditum a na; anih, rângkachak inthieng tamtak nêk khawmin. Khuoizu le khuoithlâr nêk khawmin a thlum lem bawk a nih.
Chu nawa khawm chuong thuhai chun i siehlaw hi vaulâwkin ka um hlak a. Chuong zâwm chu lâwmman nasatak neina a ni hlak.
Tuin am mâni suksuolhai hre thei a ta? Suol inthuphaia inthawk hin mi sukkieng rawh.
Thil suksuol ngainaw dingin i siehlaw hi mi chel la, Ka chungah anni chu thu inneitir naw la; chuongchun, ṭha famkimin um ka tih. Bawsietna nasataka inthawkin demkailoin um ka tih.
Aw LALPA ka lungpui le a mîn tlantu, Ka baua thu suokhai le ka lungrila ngaituonahai hi i mithmuah lâwmtlâkin um raw se.
